title: Revert "Support lazy instantiation of ProjectInstance values when CPS…

… Evaluation cache is used (#10030)"

This reverts commit eade7200e9e8c3f7017c7eff60b7cf591b2e71ac.

Fixes #
Bug 2067934

### Context
A previous performance optimization regressed the performance of vcxprojreader. I'm working on a fix for that, but, for now, I'm submitting this PR to revert the change.

### Changes Made
Reverts commit eade7200e9e8c3f7017c7eff60b7cf591b2e71ac.

### Testing
Manual testing of impacted scenarios.

### Notes
